sentences.sentence: "How despicably have I acted!" she cried.
sentences.translation: 她不禁大声叫道：“我做得多么卑鄙！”

sentences.sentence: Also may continue in the Xinan to do, even if Fu is exposed to the sun despicably , but where can bump into such man.
sentences.translation: 再说还可以继续在新安干下去，纵然傅朝阳卑劣，可是哪儿都会碰到这样的男人。

sentences.sentence: That cold wind, thin body, thin despicably thin quilt... filled the fluttering snowflakes, so that I can not think of going.
sentences.translation: 那冰冷的风，单薄的身子，薄得不能再薄的被子……漫天飞舞的雪花，让我不敢再想下去。
